mapper.sql: id, position_id, curr_date, post_duties, tenure_requirements, position_type, include, create_time, op_time, is_valid
mapper.insert:
insert into position_desc ( position_id, curr_date, post_duties, tenure_requirements, position_type, include, create_time, op_time, is_valid) values
(#{positiondesc.positionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positiondesc.currDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiondesc.postDuties,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiondesc.tenureRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiondesc.positionType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positiondesc.include,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()),UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()),1)
